betterquesting:10.desc:8:
After unlocking Note Magic, you can craft some powerful elemental tools. 
Crafting it only requires a small amount of elements and a piece of rare earth, very cost-effective, next introduce their functions. 

Blazing Pickaxe: Comes with the Blazing 1, Exploration 2 enchantment, 25% chance of dropping clusters of raw minerals when digging raw minerals, shift+right-click consumes 10 durability points to show the location of minerals around you. Additionally, the Blazing Heart pickaxe will ignite creatures that are hit. 

 Wind and Thunder Sword: Comes with the Arc 2 enchantment, attacking an enemy will trigger the Chain Lightning trait, and the projectile arcs will ripple through secondary targets. Additionally, right clicking with the Wind and Thunder Sword creates a whirlwind that blows away nearby enemies and slowly floats the player. 

 Running Axe: Comes with Gathering and Chain Gathering enchantments, when chopping down a tree, first start destroying it from the farthest square from the target square until the whole tree is chopped down, and at the same time speeds up the withering of the leaves to get the sapling quickly. The destroyed squares will slowly float towards the player. Additionally, right clicking with the Penumbra Axe will attract surrounding drops to the player. 

 Post Earth Shovel: comes with the Destruction enchantment, digging can destroy 3x3 squares of earth and sand and such; right clicking can duplicate 3x3 target squares (need to have have target squares) for most squares. Pressing G will adjust the direction of square placement. 

Sentence Mango Hoe: You can cultivate a 3x3 field at once; right-clicking on a crop or other plant while holding the Sentence Mango Hoe will make the plant grow faster. 
\nAll elemental tools are extremely useful and are recommended to be made as soon as you are able to.
